data.Nombre: Technical Analysis of the Financial Markets, A Comprehensive Guide to the Trading Methods and Applications
data.Nota: Disponible en impreso, pdf y kindle. Tiene una guía de estudio aparte.
data.Cita: "Trading system development is part art, part science, and part common sense. Our goal IS NOT to develop a system that achieves the highest returns using historical data, but to formulate a sound concept that has performed reasonably well in the past and can be expected to continue to perform reasonably well in the future."

data.Nombre: Volumen Profile, The Insider's Guide to Trading
data.Nota: Disponible en impreso, pdf y kindle.
data.Cita: Volumes are the most important information the market can give us because around 80 % of all trades and volumes are made just by 10 biggest financial institutions. They move and manipulate the markets. In order to be profitable we need to know what they are doing.

data.Nombre: Market Wizards: Interviews with Top Traders
data.Nota: Disponible en impreso, pdf y kindle.
Disponible en impreso, pdf y kindle.
Disponible en impreso, pdf y kindle.
data.Cita: Accepting the risk means accepting the consequences of your trades without emotional discomfort or fear. This means that you must learn how to think about trading and your relationship with the markets in such a way that the possibility of being wrong, losing, missing out, or leaving money on the table doesn't cause your mental defense mechanism to kick in and take you out of the opportunity flow.

data.Nombre: Reminiscences of a Stock Operator, Biography of Jesse Livermore
data.Nota: Disponible en impreso, pdf y kindle.
data.Cita: Of all speculative bluders there are a few greater than trying to average a losing game.
